name: Vermins out of my casino !
description:
You're the owner of a small casino, you play against costumers and kick out the mafia.  You have to draw a bigger number than your opponent's, but be careful dices are sparse !

Music :  "Night in Venice" Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com) Licensed under Creative Commons: By Attribution 4.0 License http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/4.0/
